name: Addon Package for Elementor
author: Michael Leithold

sections.description:
This lightweight Plugin (Addon for Elementor) allows you to use FlexSlider in Elementor (Full Responsive).

Features (FREE)

Basic FlexSlider (Responsive)

  • Image Slider
  • Image Slider + Thumbnail Navigation
  • Carousel

Options:
Animation: Slide/Fade
Slideshow: Yes/No
Loop: Yes/No
Touch Support: Yes/No
Animation Speed: 600-5000ms
ControlNav: Yes/No
+ a lot options about styling

FlexSlider WooCommerce (Responsive)

  • WooCommerce Product Carousel
    Type: All Products or Featured Products
  • WooCommerce Categorie Carousel
    Type: All / Selected or child Categories of Parent Categories

Options:
Elements in Line: 2-6
Slideshow: Yes/No
Loop: Yes/No
Touch: Yes/No
Animation Speed: 600-5000ms
+ a lot options about styling

FlexSlider Post Slider / Carousel (Responsive)

  • Post Slider with Thumbnail Navigation
    Type: Specified Posts or Posts from selected Categories
  • Post Carousel
    Type: Specified Posts or Posts from selected Categories

Options:
Elements in Line: 2-6
Slideshow: Yes/No
Loop: Yes/No
Touch: Yes/No
Animation Speed: 600-5000ms
+ a lot options about styling

Features (PRO)

Comming Soon
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin over wordpress (Or install the plugin via the WordPress build in function)
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. Edit your desired page via “Elementor” and type in to the search field “FlexSlider”.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Added: Post Slider / Carousel (Posts from post categorie / Specified posts) + a lot options to customize.

1.0.1

  • Added options: change color for bullets (directionNav) & change color for arrows (controlNav)

1.0.0

  • Plugin release
